duties_responsibilities.duty: Supporting all aspects of ad-hoc reporting
Production of investor allocations and calculation of management/ incentive fees.
Managing career advancement for staff for a group of 1-2 employees
Working on a global team responsible for reconciling cash/securities, pricing the fund portfolios, and calculating daily profit and loss.
Assisting with researching internal differences between the accounting and trade entry systems
Working with auditors to prepare and present year-end financial accounts

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting or related discipline
